verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:8
verses.text: When the most High divided to the nations their inheritance, when he separated the sons of Adam, he set the bounds of the people according to the number of the children of Israel.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:9
verses.text: For the Lord’s portion is his people; Jacob is the lot of his inheritance.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:10
verses.text: He found him in a desert land, and in the waste howling wilderness; he led him about, he instructed him, he kept him as the apple of his eye.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:11
verses.text: As an eagle stirreth up her nest, fluttereth over her young, spreadeth abroad her wings, taketh them, beareth them on her wings:
